Plot: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the financial crisis.
Title: Margin Call
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Paul Bettany, Jeremy Irons, Zachary Quinto
tomatoConsensus: Smart, tightly wound, and solidly acted, Margin Call turns the convoluted financial meltdown of '08 into gripping, thought-provoking drama.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 23 nominations.
